title: 2021 Europe Top 16 Cup
description: The 2021 Europe Top 16 Cup (also referred to as the 2021 Pomegranate Europe Top 16 Cup for sponsorship reasons) is a table tennis competition scheduled to be held on 18 and 19 September 2021 in Thessaloniki, Greece, organised under the authority of the European Table Tennis Union (ETTU). It will be the 50th edition of the event, and the first time that it has been held in Greece.
